name: Seed (barsk)
description:
[SK Games]

1-8 player, pilot a small seed around space, hit both buttons to boost, chill or try boost through friends. Keeps going. Is good.

Seed Sable is less players but includes a lovely audio track from musician Sable and a background that pulses along with the tunes.

Made for ambient play in chill spaces.

Includes instructions to make your own controller. (not very good ones)

SK Games can be Louie, Meg, Chris, Sof, Blake and Kai.
